trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Congress
There were no other sightings in Congress on or around October 8th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been reluctant to report this until now - I was sitting in the shaded area of my back yard - looking in a Eastery direction - I observed this brown cylinder shaped "tank like" cross the sky at about a 30 degree height angle from the horizion.��� At first I thought it might have been an emply booster from a space shuttle returning to earth - I would estimate the altitude at about 10,000 ft - I saw it clearly since at that angle the sun iluminated very well - the sky was clear.��� I dismissed the booster idea because it retraced the arc in the opposite direction.��� The time of observation was less than 1 minute - then about a two to three minute period until it came back at about the same speed - which I would consider very fast.��� It made no sound and did not live a vapor trail.I have since move back to Pennsylvania -���
Summary: Cylinder shaped - brownish colored. looked very large - at least the size of a railroad tanker - crossed the sky - then retraced the arc about 2 minutes later
